title: Lions in The Street - Lions In The Street (2010)

Lions in The Street - Lions In The Street (2010) mp3 320 Kbps

Lions In The Street is a band from Vancouver, Canada. Started in 2006 by Chris (guitar and vocals), Sean (guitar), Enzo (bass) and Jeff (drums), four real lovers of 70s rock.
